snippet.title: Hunter’s Arena Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hunter’s Arena: Legends is a unique hybrid of Action RPG and Battle Royale genres. 
Take on the role of a powerful hunter, hunt dangerous PvE monsters, and battle other players in an ultimate melee Battle Royale experience.

Learn more
http://hunters.imantisco.com/
